course_title: Special Topics in Accounting: Firm Fundamentals & Mispricing
class_notes: This course will expose you to state-of-the-art research and valuable frameworks on the optimal use of accounting information for forecasting and on the identification of market inefficiencies in using accounting information for firm valuation. You will identify relevant research, access appropriate databases, and use effective tools for performing analyses to distinguish between the fundamental value versus investor sentiment components of stock prices. Using these accounting signals will therefore aid in selecting stocks that potentially earn abnormal stock returns and beat the market.
schedule_location: TTh 2:30pm-3:45pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W330
